messages.noInternet: The contributions cannot be displayed due to no Internet connection.
messages.positionMarkerPopup: If it's not your current location, please drag the marker to the correct one.
messages.pcGPSError: GPS error! Please drag the marker to set your current location.
messages.mobileGPSError: GPS error! Please turn on your geolocation service or drag the marker to set your current location.
messages.localStorageError: This browser does not support local storage.
messages.contributionSuccessNoInternet: Thank you for your contribution. You are currently in offline mode, please re-open the application once you have an Internet connection to share your contribution.
messages.bingNoInternet: Bing Aerial cannot be displayed due to no Internet connection.
messages.osmNoInternet: OpenStreetMap cannot be displayed due to no Internet connection.
